title: Opinions on Smart Cast
body:
Through reading some recent posts and replies in the forum, I have noticed smart cast being mentioned quite a few times and it being turned off and on. I usually have smart cast turned on for everything. 

Is this wrong? Should I turn them off and use regular cast instead? What is the advantage of having them turned off?

Thanks for your time guys.

replies.body: hmmm ... I'll say that with regular cast on you can press say q and position it for use before clicking (say it was a skillshot), it would be more accurate than smartcasting. However with smartcasting you sac accuracy for faster reactions. Idk its a matter of personal opinion. Personally smart cast works better for me.
Ya, that's basically what I thought. I really do prefer smart cast because it makes everything quicker.

If you have reached level, it is time to turn smart cast on for every spell and at least 2 of your item slots(for botrk and such). You will quickly learn the ranges of your spells and you will actually find it easier to land skillshots after a while because you are relying on instinct over an indicator. It also obviously gives you a quicker possible reaction speed, and makes it easier to perform intricate combos( one shotting with rengar , insec with lee sin etc)
